faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions from our customers

items.question: What do I need to prepare?
items.answer: Prepare your logo (if available), product/service photos, contact information (phone, Line ID, address), and menu/service details with prices. The more complete your information, the faster and better we can create your website.

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: Typically 1-2 business days after receiving complete information. If your data is ready and not too complex, it may be completed faster.

items.question: How many revisions are included?
items.answer: Basic and Professional packages allow minor adjustments during development. For major revisions after delivery, we recommend the Premium package which includes 1 revision.

items.question: Do you support multiple languages?
items.answer: Yes! Professional and Premium packages support 2 languages (Thai-English) with an easy language switcher for visitors. Perfect for shops with international customers.
